description_html:
DuChâteau proudly presents The Sovereign Edition, an exclusive line of luxury vinyl plank flooring. This collection exemplifies our signature natural aesthetic with an embossed in register for a truly unique look and feel. Each plank features a rich tonality that brings together a completely new and bold color to the world of resilient flooring.

Boasting a 3-mm thickness, this ultra-resistant resilient vinyl floor features an antimicrobial ceramic-reinforced polyurethane finish and promises to keep its beauty for years in both residential and commercial applications. This collection is well suited to guard against exposure to heat, light, chemicals and fungus. The Sovereign Edition is meant to keep its gorgeous finish for years to come, carrying a proud and trusted 30-year residential and 15-year commercial warranty.

Like all vinyl products under The Atelier Series, The Sovereign Edition is 100% recyclable, contributes to LEED® credits, exceeds the U.S. Toy and Safety Standard (ASTM F963) and is FloorScore® - Low-VOC certified to ensure that time spent on an Atelier floor is always safe for everyone.

The Sovereign Edition broadens the appeal of hardwood visuals for those who want the signature aesthetic and quality of The Atelier Series brand in a luxury vinyl floor. Offering an impressive .7 mm wear layer, and embossed in register design, it is also fiberglass-enhanced for greater dimensional stability. This Atelier Series floor attains a truly one of a kind look and feel that bridges the gap between the natural world and resilient surfaces.
product_name: The Atelier Series, The Sovereign Edition
